_sText:
RUINS

Bomb/Defuse Map for Counter-Strike: Source

CS:GO original map creator: 3Dnj
CS:S ported map creator: Niko
Navigation Mesh editor: Meurglis3

High-quality port for CS:S of the wonderful same-named map for CS:GO by 3Dnj / Valentin Levillain.
This port contains some constructive changes in comparison with the original, which was made for improvement of the gameplay smoothness.

Story:
   The action-movie-like mission have been set in a mexican jungle full of Mayan relics...
The insurgent fighters seek to destroy one of the two weapon storages of regular army - there is one inside the temple and one in outside area.
The regular army's soldiers must prevent the destruction of weapon's strategic reserves and save the major national landmarks.

P.S. ~ A jungle comes alive... to take another life :-)
